title: XT-1100 freighter
wikitext:
'''Craft''':Stock Corellian XT-1100 Light Transport
'''Type''': Light Freighter
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 30.5m
'''Crew''': 1 to 2
'''Passengers''': 4
'''Cargo Capacity''': 75 metric tons
'''Consumables''': 2 months
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x2
'''Hyperdrive Backup''': x11
'''Nav Computer:''' Yes
'''Maneuverability''': 1D
'''Space''': 4
'''Atmosphere''': 280;800 kmh
'''Hull''': 4D
'''Shields''': 0D
'''Sensors''':
''Passive'':10/0D;
''Scan'':25/1D;
''Search'':40/2D;
''Focus'':2/3D
'''Weapons''':None == Description: == Longer, thinner version of the popular YT-1300. Designed to be a fast, more maneuverable model. Because of this the XT has less cargo space. It also comes equipped with no weapons, although most owners have some installed when they purchase them.  The Xt-1100 has a smaller, more oval saucer area and longer mandibles.
